title: security awareness training program
extract: Security Innovation's Gartner Magic Quadrant leading program is designed to be highly interactive and includes professional and purpose built modules to equip employees with skills to recognise the importance of being aware and to proactively protect themselves against potential information security threats.
extract_html: Security Innovation's Gartner Magic Quadrant leading program is designed to be highly interactive and includes professional and purpose built modules to equip employees with skills to recognise the importance of being aware and to proactively protect themselves against potential information security threats.
